news.title: Top UN court says countries can sue each other over climate change
news.summary: The decision from the world's highest court has been welcomed by developing nations at most risk from climate change.

news.title: Gazans 'wasting away' as mass starvation spreads, humanitarian groups warn
news.summary: A joint statement says aid workers are "now joining the same food lines, risking being shot just to feed their families".

news.title: Mother and two children killed in Northern Ireland shooting, BBC understands
news.summary: Police say all three died from gunshot wounds and a man is seriously injured in hospital.

news.title: Macrons file defamation suit against US influencer Candace Owens
news.summary: The French president and his wife say they have repeatedly asked for a retraction from the popular conspiracy theorist.

news.title: British surgeon who had his legs removed  accused of fraud
news.summary: Neil Hopper, 49, is also accused of encouraging the commission of grievous bodily harm.

news.title: Ozzy's fans flocked to Birmingham for his final gig. Now they are back to mourn him
news.summary: Makeshift shrines in the star's home city have pint glasses and whisky bottles among the flowers and candles.

news.title: Police deny driving counter-protesters to asylum hotel demonstration
news.summary: Essex Police says it is not "collaborating" with people supporting asylum seekers in Epping.

news.title: M&S ad banned over 'unhealthily thin' model
news.summary: The advertising watchdog said the model's pose and pointy shoes made her appear too slim.

news.title: City traders jailed for interest rate-rigging have convictions quashed
news.summary: Tom Hayes and Carlo Palombo said for a decade they were victims of a series of miscarriages of justice relating to the manipulation of Libor and Euribor interest rates.

news.title: Backlash grows after Zelensky strips anti-corruption bodies of independence
news.summary: Protests gather pace in Ukrainian cities as some of Kyiv's closest allies sound alarm bells.
